title: Curriculum Development Practice Competency Enhancement: Case-Based Expert Competencies for Second Language Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic second-language knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply and analyze 12 core elements (e.g., interaction structure, contextual feedback) for effective online second-language learning design to practical cases
Learners can develop a framework to evaluate the complexity of online learning design based on observational data
Learners can design project-based activities that enhance learner engagement even in environments with limited digital resources
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
